availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Scholl (Powell County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk and Stanton postmaster)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, court clerk and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Talitha Scholl. Father of William Clayton Scholl, Mary M. Scholl, Malinda Ellen Scholl, Milared C. Scholl, and Betty A. Scholl. Farmer in Clark County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk of the Powell Circuit Court from 1858 to 1866. Postmaster of Stanton, Kentucky, from March 29, 1864, to June 27, 1865.
